attributes.action: Keep Schools Open during lockdown for pupils mental physical -future-wellbeing
attributes.additional_details: Teachers and staff to have complete backing of govt for correct measures to keep them safe and well.
attributes.background: Without a learning structure are children will lose there Opportunity to thrive - we need to give them this now whilst we can - They really are the future of the country and planet - less scares will produce increased creativity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
